Package view.beerapp.activities.navigation

Hold all the activities and fragments that can be accessed from the navigation drawer

See: Description

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    BaseActivity
    Contains the basics to use the navigation drawer.
    DrinkListActivity
    Class displaying all the drinks in the application database
    FriendsActivity
    FriendsActivity class represent the list of users who use this app, and the current user can see which of them his/her friend is and add or delete them.
    LocationsActivity
    List of all the locations in the application
    MapsActivity
    Maps Activity with google API
    ProfileActivity
    ProfileActivity class represent the profile of the user, who can edit his/her personal information, see and edit his/her favorite drink list
    SettingsActivity
    Display all the settings for the user to be modifier

Package view.beerapp.activities.navigation Description

Hold all the activities and fragments that can be accessed from the navigation drawer
